author.name: Mike Doan
author.description: CPA | Co-founder at @Basis365 Accounting | Tweets about business, PKM, #bitcoin, and sharing what I’m learning.

html: I’ve been using this and loving it. Happy to see it hit the Community Plugin. https://t.co/xApNLlHn1L

author.name: Mark McElroy
author.description: I'm no longer on Twitter. Please consider following me on Mastodon (@markmcelroy@pkm.social) and via RSS feeds from https://t.co/qDSlwzBszf or https://t.co/FWnra2ppH0.

author.name: Heptabase
author.description: A visual note-taking tool for learning complex topics. (YC W22)

html: In the latest version, you can *put journals on the whiteboard to plan your days and weeks! https://t.co/MGw5flnDYp

author.name: NeuraCache 🧠
author.description: long-term memory assistant in your pocket\n\n🔁 integrates with @obsdmd, @NotionHQ, @Evernote, @Logseq, @RoamResearch, @MsOneNote

html: @MedHippocrates @obsdmd @rem_note You could also try a combo of @obsdmd  + @neuracache 😇 (offline, no signup, no ads, free tier)

author.name: Joseph Wood
author.description: Observing and writing about PKMs and occasionally some web3 // I like taking photos // Father to a son with Cystic Fibrosis 65🌹

html:
This is the release of the year for me.

Block references still need work, but this is the biggest piece of the puzzle for me.

This is my favorite plugin by far. Excellent work! https://t.co/rwmsGf55lH
